```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(coronavirus)
library(plotly)
library(viridis)


data("coronavirus")

```

## Daily worldwide cumulative cases

```{r}
daily_df = 
  coronavirus %>% 
  group_by(date, type) %>% 
  summarize(n = sum(cases)) 
```


```{r daily plotly}

daily_df %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~date, 
          y = ~n, 
          type = "scatter", 
          color = ~type, 
          mode = "markers", 
          stackgroup = "one")

```
